attributes.action: Make footballers earning over £200,000   per year pay 90 percent income tax
attributes.background: Make footballers earning  200,000 per year pay more income tax  and use it for school meals ,pensioners  triple lock

rejection.details: Income tax rates apply to people based on their employment status and how much they earn, not their profession. We could accept a petition calling for income tax to be increased for people earning over £200,000 a year, if that's what you want to happen.
